name: arbitrary
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: arbitrary
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: based on chance rather than being planned or based on reason
trans_examp.trans_cn: 任意的；随机的；随心所欲的

example.eg: Did you have a reason for choosing your destination or was it arbitrary?
example.egtrans: 你根据什么选择目的地？还是随意选定的？

dsense.name: arbitrary
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: using unlimited personal power without considering other people's wishes

example.eg: The company has been the subject of an arbitrary take-over.
